original: Jakobson, Karl Justus, landsfiskal, Klintehamn, f. 13/3/90 i Bäl, Gotl. 1., av C. P. J. o. Julia Foblin. G. 19 m. Marta Flemming. Barn: Bengt f. 20, stud. V. soc:pol inst.,, Sven 22, färghand :bitr. — Reaikx. i Visby 07, lians-mansex. VI. E. ilandskont. 13, land’s-■kont. 17, land;s,fiskal i Klintehamns dii-str. sed. 19. Led. av hamndir., ordf. i tingshusstyr., brandchef.
translated: Jakobson, Karl Justus, district prosecutor, Klintehamn, born March 13, 1890 in Bäl, Gotland. Son of C. P. J. and Julia Foblin. Married Marta Flemming in 1919. Children: Bengt, born in 1920, studying at the Social Science Institute, Sven, born in 1922, works as an assistant in a paint store. Graduated from Visby in 1907, served as a deputy sheriff in 1906, district clerk in 1913, district prosecutor in Klintehamn since 1919. Member of the port authorities, chairman of the courthouse board, fire chief.
